dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Apple Inc. (AAPL)’s Struggle: Can AI Help Regain Market Share in 2025?
News Content: We recently published a list of 15 Important AI News and Ratings on Investors’ Radar. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) stands against other important AI news and ratings on investors’ radar.

On Monday, the US government revealed that it would further restrict artificial intelligence chip and technology exports. As reported by Reuters, the goal behind these restrictions is to help the US advance its computing power and AI technology, while finding more ways to block China’s access. Under the new regulations, the number of AI chips exported to most countries will be capped, allowing unlimited access to U.S. AI technology for America’s closest allies. Meanwhile, a block shall be maintained on exports to China, Russia, Iran, and North Korea.

“The U.S. leads AI now – both AI development and AI chip design, and it’s critical that we keep it that way”.

READ NOW: Top 10 AI Stocks on Wall Street’s Radar and 10 Buzzing AI Stocks on Latest News and Ratings

These regulations are seemingly the last efforts by the Biden administration to maintain US leadership in AI and close any loopholes in controlling the flow of AI chips. The new administration, set to take office on January 20, shares similar views on the competitive threat from China. However, President-elect Donald Trump is expected to make significant changes to the Biden administration’s stance on artificial intelligence.

“We will repeal Joe Biden’s dangerous Executive Order that hinders AI innovation, and imposes radical leftwing ideas on the development of this technology. In its place, Republicans support AI development rooted in free speech and human flourishing”.

With only a few days left until Trump takes office, the recently revealed restrictions on AI chips have been imposed on advanced graphics processing units (GPUs), which are used to power data centers needed to train AI models. Moreover, under the new rules, cloud providers will be able to build data centers by applying for global approval. Once approved, they won’t need export licenses for AI chips which will allow them to build data centers in countries that cannot import enough chips because of the U.S.-imposed quotas. However, these authorized companies must abide by stringent conditions and restrictions, such as security requirements, reporting demands, and a plan or track record of respecting human rights.

Currently, the recent regulation divides the world into three tiers. 18 countries, including Japan, Britain, South Korea, and the Netherlands, will essentially be exempt from the rules. Moreover, 120 other countries, including Singapore, Israel, Saudi Arabia, and the United Arab Emirates, will face country caps, whereas arms-embargoed countries like Russia, China, and Iran will not be allowed to receive the technology altogether.

Story Continues

“How effective the rule ends up being in the next 10 to 15 years is now up to the incoming team. They are well aware that ensuring a dominant domestic industry is a core element of competition with China”.

For this article, we selected AI stocks by going through news articles, stock analysis, and press releases. These stocks are also popular among hedge funds.

Why are we interested in the stocks that hedge funds pile into? The reason is simple: our research has shown that we can outperform the market by imitating the top stock picks of the best hedge funds. Our quarterly newsletter’s strategy selects 14 small-cap and large-cap stocks every quarter and has returned 275% since May 2014, beating its benchmark by 150 percentage points (see more details here).Apple Inc. (AAPL)'s Struggle: Can AI Help Regain Market Share in 2025?

A wide view of an Apple store, showing the range of products the company offers.

Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL)

Number of Hedge Fund Holders: 158

Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is a technology company. Recently, the company has had underwhelming upgrades and competitors that have led the iPhone maker to lose market share in the final quarter of 2024. Bloomberg cited research by Counterpoint Research data, stating how the iPhone’s market share slipped a point to 18% worldwide in 2024. As per the research, the company marked a 2% sales decline for the full year, while the wider market grew 4% globally.

On the other hand, Android device makers from China, led by Xiaomi Corp. and Vivo, have been gaining strength in the region. Since Apple’s new artificial intelligence suite isn’t available in China, the lack of AI availability has hindered its performance in the region. The company is currently striving to partner up with local players to provide features such as AI writing assistance and image generation. Nevertheless, Apple’s AI hasn’t been all the rage, either.

“Apple’s iPhone 16 series was met with a mixed response, partly due to a lack of availability of Apple Intelligence at launch. However, Apple continued to grow strongly in its noncore markets like Latin America”.

Overall, AAPL ranks 2nd on our list of important AI news and ratings on investors’ radar. While we acknowledge the potential of AAPL as an investment, our conviction lies in the belief that some AI stocks hold greater promise for delivering higher returns and doing so within a shorter timeframe. If you are looking for an AI stock that is more promising than AAPL but that trades at less than 5 times its earnings, check out our report about the cheapest AI stock.

READ NEXT: 8 Best Wide Moat Stocks to Buy Now and 30 Most Important AI Stocks According to BlackRock

Disclosure: None. This article is originally published at Insider Monkey.

View Comments

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities and the corresponding analysis by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35, Reasoning: The headline poses a question about whether to buy stock in Apple Inc., the largest company in the world. This suggests a level of uncertainty or debate among investors. However, being the largest company often implies strong fundamentals and market confidence. The lack of negative news or specific concerns in the headline may lead to a higher probability of stock price stability or a rise, as investors may view this as a buying opportunity. Therefore, I estimate a higher probability of the stock price rising compared to falling.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The news presents a mixed outlook for Apple. The US government's AI chip export restrictions could indirectly benefit Apple by hindering Chinese competitors. However, the uncertainty surrounding the incoming Trump administration's AI policies adds volatility. The article highlights Apple's recent market share loss and the underwhelming response to its AI suite, particularly in China. While Apple is striving to improve its AI offerings, the article suggests other AI stocks may offer better returns. Overall, the negative aspects seem to outweigh the potential positives in the short term, leading to a higher probability of a stock price fall.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.7, Reasoning: The news presents a mixed outlook for Apple. While Apple is projected to meet Wall Street's earnings expectations with a 4% revenue increase, the analyst maintains an "underweight" rating and a price target significantly below the current market price.  This suggests the analyst believes the market is overvaluing Apple.  Several factors contribute to this bearish outlook:  weak iPhone sales growth (potentially impacted by the iPhone SE and Indonesian ban), lack of an AI-driven update cycle (a significant growth driver for competitors), and increased competition from Chinese companies. Although the revenue growth is positive, it falls short of typical seasonal performance, indicating underlying weakness. The analyst's concerns outweigh the positive revenue projection, leading to a higher probability of a price fall.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.2, Reasoning: The news headline 'Investing in Luxury Stocks' does not directly mention Apple Inc. (AAPL), which is primarily known for its technology products rather than being a luxury brand. However, Apple does have a premium brand image and some of its products are considered luxury items. Given the indirect nature of the news, the impact on Apple's stock price is likely to be neutral or minimal. Therefore, the probability of a significant rise or fall in the stock price due to this news is low.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.5, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.5, Reasoning: The news headline 'Investing in Luxury Stocks' does not directly mention Apple Inc. (AAPL) or provide any specific information about the company's performance, products, or financials. Apple is generally considered a technology company rather than a luxury goods provider. Therefore, this news is unlikely to have a direct impact on Apple's stock price. Given the lack of relevance, I estimate the probability of the stock price rising or falling due to this news as low. The probabilities are roughly equal, with a slight bias towards no significant change, but for the purpose of this task, I will assign them as 0.5 for both.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35, Reasoning: The news article discusses Apple Inc. (AAPL) as a potential safe dividend stock for 2025, highlighting its strong financial position, consistent dividend payments, and growth prospects. The company's revenue growth, strong cash position, and increasing dividend payouts are all positive factors. Additionally, the fact that 158 hedge funds hold stakes in AAPL, worth nearly $110 billion, indicates a high level of investor confidence. However, the article also mentions that the stock has already surged by over 28% in the past 12 months, which may lead to a correction or consolidation. Overall, the positive factors outweigh the negative ones, suggesting a higher probability of the stock price rising.
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.5, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.5, Reasoning: The provided news headline 'Investing in Luxury Stocks' is too vague to draw specific conclusions about Apple Inc. (AAPL). Luxury stocks typically refer to companies in sectors like fashion, jewelry, or premium goods. Without more context or details about how Apple Inc. is being discussed within the luxury stock category, it's challenging to accurately estimate the impact on Apple's stock price. Additionally, the content of the news article is missing, which would have provided necessary insights into the context.


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The news presents a mixed outlook for Apple. The core issue is Apple's struggle to regain market share, particularly in the face of competition from Chinese Android device makers. The lack of AI availability in China is a significant hindrance. While Apple is trying to partner with local players, its AI hasn't been particularly impressive. The article also mentions the iPhone 16 series received a mixed response due to the lack of Apple Intelligence at launch. The US government's AI chip export restrictions could indirectly benefit Apple by hindering Chinese competitors, but the uncertainty surrounding the incoming Trump administration's AI policies adds volatility. The previous rounds of predictions are quite varied, with some leaning towards a rise and others towards a fall. Given the market share loss, AI struggles, and mixed reception of the iPhone 16, I believe the negative aspects outweigh the potential positives in the short term. However, Apple's strong position in non-core markets and the potential for AI improvements prevent a strong bearish outlook.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "Apple Inc. (AAPL)’s Struggle: Can AI Help Regain Market Share in 2025?",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.4,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.6
}
```
